title: Net speed question?
body: So ive been looking around, and most people say that around 4.8MB/s is optimal for a decent ms in league. Im currently running on average between 17.2 and 21.8 MB/s DL speed, but when i get near an enemy, or use an ability, my MS jumps to 300-500ms. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Those were pretty dang good DL speeds for sure! Pretty concerning that your MS is getting so high in team fights though. It'd be a pretty good first step to go ahead and try power cycling your router/modem and then try using an ethernet/wired connection to make sure you're getting a solid signal. If that doesn't help out too much, no worries, our techs will be able to dig into your network logs if you send them over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
